name: Break The Blaze
description:
Dump water from the nearby Lake onto the spreading wildfire before it reaches a town. (GO FULL SCREEN)

As this was our first Game Jam experience there were certainly hurdles we had to get over. We bit off a lot for this project and we're proud of our janky little prototype. We didn't quite realize how much time to allow ourselves to build and upload to the GMTK Game Jam 2021 Page... we got it uploaded to itch.io about 40 seconds after submissions closed. *sigh*

CONTROLS:

Move: WASD        Refill/Drop Water: Space

CREDITS:

Design: Colton Moritz

Development: Logand & Zack Weathersby

Title Music: Colton Weathersby
